reviewText:
My four year old son literally wants to watch this over and over every day.
And I love the adult Tales from the Crypt, this cartoon was also a favorite of mine as a child.
We enjoy watching these together, the dvd is about 2 and 1/2 hours long so keeps him entertained for a while ! Myself included.
I loved this cartoon when I was a kid, and I get so excited to watch these with my son.  He loves them, and I get to relive my childhood again.

this is a great show. from what i hear and what i somewhat saw that this has episodes from season two and they are in no order. so what i remember from season two here are the best episodes.

Episodes

Game Over
2. The Spider And The Flies
4. The Avenging Phantom
6. The Weeping Woman
7. All The Gory Details
8. Dead Men Don't Jump
9. The Haunted Mine
10. Growing Pains
11. The Brothers Gruff
13. Hunted
14. Chuck (And Melvin) And The Beanstalker
15. Transylvania Twist

if you have not seen this season then i recommend you do
Great little cartoons on here. I love the art and some cool stories as well. If you like Tales from the crypt, and who doesn't, you will like this as well.

This disk entitled Transylvania Express has 7 episodes of season 2. episodes 7-13 in random order. The other re-issued disk named Myth Conceptions has episodes 1-6 of season 2 in random order.

So if you buy both disks you will have the complete second season to go along with the re-issue of the complete firs season.
i am very interested in this DVD however there is no episode list. Please add list and i can rate this better.
